sentences.english: Optic fiber is now the preferred transmission medium for long-haul trunks.
sentences.chinese: 光纤已是长途干线的首选传输媒质。

sentences.english: The great railway lines of England all start from London.
sentences.chinese: 英国的铁路干线都以伦敦为起点。

sentences.english: Modern railway lines give you a smooth , untroubled journey.
sentences.chinese: 现代的铁路干线将给你一段平稳而无忧的旅程。

sentences.english: This would mark the first major transfer of Japan's Shinkansen technology to China.
sentences.chinese: 这是日本首次将新干线技术用于中国主干铁路传输网。

sentences.english: Frunk roads may be shown by heavier line.
It was at the center of the world's trade and communication highways.

sentences.english: This air line operates five main lines and twenty branch lines.

sentences.english: Nigerians court to Garden Road and North Road to traffic Tzu Link.

sentences.english: Tokaido Shinkansen from Tokyo to Odawara section suspended due to power failure operation.

sentences.english: However, transport links north of New York City, Northern Railway is still suspended.
sentences.chinese: 但纽约市以北的交通干线北方铁路仍旧暂停。

sentences.english: The Middle Route Project of the South-to-North Water Diversion is a giant project in new century in China.

sentences.english: To guarantee the trunk highway smoothly.

sentences.english: Traffic often bunches on the big highways.
sentences.chinese: 在干线公路上，交通常挤成一堆。

sentences.english: Trunk lines are those which operate between major population centers.
sentences.chinese: 干线航班在主要人口中心城市营运。

sentences.english: The wreck held up traffic on the railroad's main line tracks.
sentences.chinese: 失事的车辆阻碍了铁路干线的交通。
